name: The Gameshow
description: The Gameshow is an FPS game where you participate in a dangerous survival game. This is not your game. You, together with other players, have been kidnapped and brought to a forest. Now, surviving is your only objective.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 Storage: 2 GB available space
